ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup sour cream, or as needed

cookingTips: Use gourmet potato chips for better texture and flavor than standard versions
Arrange chips in a visually appealing stack before topping
Add caviar at the very last moment to maintain delicate roe integrity
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook plate an elegant appetizer that combines crispy chips, creamy sour cream, and luxurious trout roe with chives.
